name: Portfolio
description: Directory Structure ------------------- css\              - Stylesheets CSS files for the template. images\           - Images used in template. scripts\          - JavaScript used in the template. styles\           - SCSS source files for stylesheets CSS. Available in Purchased versions only. favicon.ico       - Favicon placeholder provided for the template. index.html        - Main HTML page to open the template in browser. *.html            - Additional HTML pages (if any). LICENSE-*.txt     - License file as per your downloaded variant.
